vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to go out, be extinguished, dry up
1a) (Qal) to go out, be extinguished
1b) (Niphal) to be made extinct, be dried up
1c) (Pual) to be extinguished, be quenched
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   extinguirse, estar extinto; (b) nif.   secarse; (c) pu.   extinguirse, estar extinto
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 熄滅, 撲滅, 枯竭
1a) (Qal) 熄滅, 撲滅
1b) (Niphal) 被滅絕, 枯竭 (伯6:17)
1c) (Pual) 被熄滅, 被終止 (詩118:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 熄灭, 扑灭, 枯竭
1a) (Qal) 熄灭, 扑灭
1b) (Niphal) 被灭绝, 枯竭 (伯6:17)
1c) (Pual) 被熄灭, 被终止 (诗118:12)
